PSCT.Base: Target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of different Monster Types among the Link Monsters you control that are Insect, Plant, or Reptile; destroy them. If a face-up Insect, Plant, or Reptile monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Ragnaraika Hunting Dance" once per turn.
